trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenReceived"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The event is raised when an issued token is received from the security token service (STS) during sign-in using WS-Federation.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 보안 토큰 서비스 (STS)에서 발급된 된 토큰을 받으면 중 Ws-federation을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is raised before the token is validated.
trans-unit.target: 토큰의 유효성을 검사 하기 전에 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can access the issued token through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> property and modify its properties or replace it.
trans-unit.target: 통해 발급 된 토큰에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A>속성 및 해당 속성을 수정 하거나 교체 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel sign-in processing by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 로그인 처리를 취소할 수는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified security token.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"> </xref> 지정된 된 보안 토큰을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the new instance, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `securityToken` parameter and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스에 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A>속성으로 지정 된 토큰에는 `securityToken` 매개 변수 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `null`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified security token and sign-in context.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"> </xref> 지정 된 보안 토큰 및 로그인 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the new instance, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `securityToken` parameter and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> property is set to the value of the `signInContext` property.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스에 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A>속성으로 지정 된 토큰에는 `securityToken` 매개 변수 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A>속성의 값으로 설정 됩니다는 `signInContext` 속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sign-in context specified in the control.
Gets or sets the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 발급 된 보안 토큰을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can either modify the properties of the issued security token or replace it entirely.
trans-unit.target: 발급 된 보안 토큰의 속성을 수정 하거나 완전히 바꿀 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sign-in context specified in the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 지정 된 로그인 컨텍스트를 가져옵니다.
